summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5957 for the improvement of 56th Avenue Southwest from approximately 106 feet north of West Dakota Street to Hillcrest Avenue; and certain other streets, avenues, alleys and easements, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 79414 as amended by Ordinance No. 80211, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
